casebody.data:
NC DEPARTMENT OF PUBLIC SAFETY
v.
LEDFORD 223PA16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 31, 2016 Joseph Finarelli, Special Deputy Attorney General, for North Carolina Department of Public Safety. Larry Leake, Attorney at Law, Asheville, for Ledford, Chauncey John.

Jamie A. Stokes, Attorney at Law.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 27th of October 2016 by Respondent:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 31st of October 2016."

Respondent shall have up to and including the 19th day of December 2016 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
